com.smarthome.emulator.simulations.panels

Class ServerPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smarthome.emulator.simulations.panels.ServerPanel

  • public class ServerPanel
extends java.lang.Object
    Sets model for table with Server information. Updates this model with current information.
